Title: Establishes the temporary hospitality and business relief fund and creates a credit for certain hospitality businesses affected by the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Establishes the temporary hospitality and business relief fund; creates a credit for certain hospitality businesses affected by the COVID-19 pandemic; provides insurance coverage for loss or damage incurred by business interruption resulting from an official order to close.
LawCode: Add Art 76-A §§7650 - 7650-a, §3114, amd §5402, Ins L; add §99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the temporary hospitality and business relief fund; and to amend the insurance law, in relation to creating a credit for certain hospitality businesses affected by the COVID-19 pandemic; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
